Sentencas: The use of biogas in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) is a viable approach for generating power from renewables.
Titulo: Insights on the electrochemical performance of indirect internal reforming of biogas into a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: However, the direct use of dry biogas in SOFCs causes many issues concerning the durability of cells.
Titulo: Insights on the electrochemical performance of indirect internal reforming of biogas into a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Currently, the conventional approach consists of the use of an external reformer.
Titulo: Insights on the electrochemical performance of indirect internal reforming of biogas into a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Nevertheless, other approaches are possible to reduce the complexity of SOFCs.
Titulo: Insights on the electrochemical performance of indirect internal reforming of biogas into a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In this paper, we have investigated an indirect internal dry reforming occurring in the anodic chamber of a SOFC as a viable method to minimise the balance of the plant and simplify the feed management.
Titulo: Insights on the electrochemical performance of indirect internal reforming of biogas into a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: This approach consisted of coupling a foam coated with NiCo/SDC powder in contact with the anode of a conventional SOFC cell.
Titulo: Insights on the electrochemical performance of indirect internal reforming of biogas into a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The endurance test revealed a stable behaviour over 500 h.
Titulo: Insights on the electrochemical performance of indirect internal reforming of biogas into a solid oxide fuel cell
